name: Don't Devour My Flowers
description:
Don't Devour My Flowers is a quick arcade game! Slimes from space are invading your garden. Guide Grandpa Ram to destroy the monsters, but - beware - he may trample you too! Survive as long as possible, or go for medals encouraging alternate play styles. The flowers need you - don't abandon them!

Move with WASD or the arrow keys. Dash with shift and pause with space! The game also supports a gamepad: move with the left stick, dash with A and pause with start.

Thanks for playing! Contact me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
